name: Project Petrol Boy
description:
You, a strange mushroom creature, have been captured by a gang of oil barons! Having realized that their precious resource is finite, they plan to harness your strange abilities to keep selling more and more oil. Using said power, you'll have to escape their clutches and find a way out of their factory!

Accompanied by platforming, you will have to use the trail of inflammable liquid at your feet, or aim with your projectile to create trails at a distance. Trace a way for flames to destroy obstacles, but don't let yourself be consumed by them!

Project Petrol Boy is a small game made by 4 Game Designers as part of an assignment in five weeks, in our second year of Game Design at Bellecour Ecole in France. The people working on this cute little platformer were as follows :
